title: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount  of type uint64
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am going through the [Getting Started guide](https://stack.optimism.io/docs/build/getting-started/) for deploying a new chain with the OP Stack and encountered the following error [when running these instructions](https://stack.optimism.io/docs/build/getting-started/#op-node) for `op-node`:

```
INFO [10-24|04:23:47.956] Not opted in to ProtocolVersions signal loading, disabling ProtocolVersions contract now.                                                                                                           
INFO [10-24|04:23:47.956] No persisted sequencer state loaded                                                                                                                                                                 
INFO [10-24|04:23:47.956] Rollup Config                            l2_chain_id=42069 l2_network="unknown L2" l1_chain_id=5 l1_network=goerli l2_start_time=1,698,125,280 l2_block_hash=0x3f4bc83259e8a872afe1f788ed3dd5ace895f
433500c15fca3141775f7d87c52 l2_block_number=0 l1_block_hash=0x9f479583989fa82746fecad6ce0d56f3a83b082f064523fa76eec1ecfce24264 l1_block_number=9,921,217 regolith_time="@ genesis" canyon_time="(not configured)" span_batch_t
ime="(not configured)"                                                                                                                                                                                                        
INFO [10-24|04:23:47.956] Initializing rollup node                 version=v0.0.0-77995af7-1698082827
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.407] loaded new runtime config values!        p2p_seq_address=0xA48449deD9EE50B40d674D9DCD47990b0Ba349D7
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.407] Admin RPC enabled 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.407] Starting JSON-RPC server 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.409] metrics disabled 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.409] Starting execution engine driver 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.409] Starting driver                          sequencerEnabled=true sequencerStopped=false
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.409] Rollup node started 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.409] State loop started 
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.411] Loaded current L2 heads                  unsafe=992c99..f2c29e:11 safe=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 finalized=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 unsafe_origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217 safe_origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.455] Walking back L1Block by number           curr=9f4795..e24264:9921217 next=9f4795..e24264:9921217 l2block=992c99..f2c29e:11
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.463] Hit finalized L2 head, returning immediately unsafe=992c99..f2c29e:11 safe=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 finalized=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 unsafe_origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217 safe_origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.463] Sync progress                            reason="reset derivation work" l2_finalized=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 l2_safe=3f4bc8..d87c52:0 l2_unsafe=992c99..f2c29e:11 l2_engineSyncTarget=992c99..f2c29e:11 l2_
time=1,698,125,302 l1_derived=9f4795..e24264:9921217
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.463] completed reset of derivation pipeline   origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217
INFO [10-24|04:23:48.563] Reset of L1Retrieval done                origin=9f4795..e24264:9921217                                                                                                                              
WARN [10-24|04:23:48.642] Derivation process temporary error       attempts=1 err="engine stage failed: temp: failed to open calldata source: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount
 of type uint64"
WARN [10-24|04:23:50.804] Derivation process temporary error       attempts=2 err="engine stage failed: temp: failed to open calldata source: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount
 of type uint64"
WARN [10-24|04:23:55.120] Derivation process temporary error       attempts=3 err="engine stage failed: temp: failed to open calldata source: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount
 of type uint64"
WARN [10-24|04:24:03.299] Derivation process temporary error       attempts=4 err="engine stage failed: temp: failed to open calldata source: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount
 of type uint64"
INFO [10-24|04:24:03.299] Received first L1 head signal            l1_head=706ded..43acc3:9921920
INFO [10-24|04:24:03.339] creating new block                       parent=992c99..f2c29e:11 l1Origin=e9391a..ff4c16:9921218
ERROR[10-24|04:24:03.442] sequencer temporarily failed to start building new block err="temp: failed to fetch L1 block info and receipts: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount of 
type uint64"
INFO [10-24|04:24:03.487] creating new block                       parent=992c99..f2c29e:11 l1Origin=e9391a..ff4c16:9921218
ERROR[10-24|04:24:03.649] sequencer temporarily failed to start building new block err="temp: failed to fetch L1 block info and receipts: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount of 
type uint64"
INFO [10-24|04:24:03.696] creating new block                       parent=992c99..f2c29e:11 l1Origin=e9391a..ff4c16:9921218
ERROR[10-24|04:24:03.796] sequencer temporarily failed to start building new block err="temp: failed to fetch L1 block info and receipts: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount of 
type uint64"
```

The last few lines repeat continually several times per second indefinitely. I'm wondering if this is a bug, or just a mislabeled warning message.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Follow the OP Stack Getting Started guide: https://stack.optimism.io/docs/build/getting-started/
2. Copy and paste all the commands exactly.
3. Get this error when starting `op-node`.

**Expected behavior**
No error messages.

**System Specs:**
 - OS: MacOS Sonoma 14.0
 - Package Version (or commit hash): bc8a1da1897b27b9fb29905c32790f08ad1e209d
This was a regression temporarily introduced to the develop branch and picked up by post-merge checks. It's fixed in the latest develop.  It is also not present in the latest release v1.2.0

@ajsutton I encountered the same error in the latest version and it wasn't fixed
```bash
root@op-0-0:/opt/opmain# /opt/opmain/core/node --version
op-node version v0.0.0-c7385080-1696558652
```

docker image:  us-docker.pkg.dev/oplabs-tools-artifacts/images/op-node:v1.2.0

logs:
```bash
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34070 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34071 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34072 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34073 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34074 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34075 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
t=2023-10-25T17:01:06+0800 lvl=warn msg="Derivation process temporary error"     attempts=34076 err="temp: failed to fetch receipts of L1 block 0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108:17422590 for L1 sysCfg update: receipt 0 has unexpected nil block number, expected 17422591"
```
That's my problem, the node switched the L1 node to the pruned GETH node, re-switching to the Erigon archive node is fine

The second logs show a completely different error to the first.  If you're still seeing the `cannot unmarshal string into Go struct field Withdrawal.withdrawals.amount` error with the latest `develop` can you provide the logs from that please?

And yeah the second logs do indicate that the L1 node is returning bad data.
